getProxyId().details: Gets the proxy id associated with the proxy address.

transferFrom(bytes,address,address,uint2.details: Makes a staticcall to a target address and verifies that the data returned matches the expected return data.

params.assetData: Byte array encoded with staticCallTarget, staticCallData, and expectedCallResultHash
